self_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitaly aims to flash pin Michael three times to prove it's possible, but acknowledges a 50% chance the match could stop. If it stops, he still believes he has a 50% chance to win.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Vitaly plans to attack aggressively, risking wrist fatigue if Michael defends successfully.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitaly believes Levan will win more dominantly this time compared to their first match, as Ermes is not as prepared as before.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Not as strong as in previous matches
Ermes Gasparini.health: Recovered from past injuries but may not be at peak condition
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes was hurt after their last match and took 14 months to recover.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Has progressed but Vitaly believes his own progress is greater
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Dominant in past matches, expected to perform even better now.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitaly claims a 100% chance of winning against Devon, citing Devon's avoidance behavior and past comments as reasons for his confidence.

Devon Larratt.strength: Has a solid, strong hand but talks too much
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon avoided pulling Vitaly earlier and is now delaying the match further.
